name: pumilioR
tagline: R package to query and get data out of a Pumilio system.
body:
Functions to get data from a Pumilio system. Requires version 2.6.0, or newer,
of Pumilio installed and XML turned on.

The package allows you to search a Pumilio archive and download specific sound files.

pumilioR version 1.1 is already available on CRAN: http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pumilioR/index.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
